professionalBio: Hey, I'm Mark. I'm a professional Software Engineer focused on Full-Stack development. I have a strong passion for building out applications that provide a great experience to users and am interested in working on all areas of stack, from front end web applications, to low level API developement, to mobile development.
personalBio: In my free time I like to hang out with my friends and my dog, go outside as much as possible and draw.
